description:
Start your day by planning in order to save time and avoid forgetting anything. Note all important events and appointments, and never miss a meeting again.


YOUR OWN PERSONAL CALENDAR
With nDay, you'll optimize your free time, schedule your day without worrying that something slipped your mind. Choose the year, month, day, exact hour and add a note. How simple is that? Add even more text in your description to remember more details about this date.


CUSTOMIZE AS YOU LIKE
It doesn't matter whether you use a 12 or 24-hour clock. In nDay you can customize it as you prefer. Additionally, you can change the available colors of the entire calendar according to your preferences.


KEY FEATURES:
- Simple and clear interface
- Helps you organize your day
- Customizable
name: nDay
